body_html:
When I run docker pull b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow, I get:

Error pulling image (latest) from b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow, Server error 401 while fetching image layer

Then asks me 'Please login prior to pull:
Username:'

Sidenote: I'm behind corporate firewall, I use --insecure-registry extra args to get around certificate issues and using hyper-v for boot2docker...

Please advise,
Maad
body_text:
When I run docker pull b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow, I get:
Error pulling image (latest) from b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow, Server error 401 while fetching image layer
Then asks me 'Please login prior to pull:
Username:'
Sidenote: I'm behind corporate firewall, I use --insecure-registry extra args to get around certificate issues and using hyper-v for boot2docker...
Please advise,
Maad
body:
When I run docker pull b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow, I get:

Error pulling image (latest) from b.gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow, Server error 401 while fetching image layer

Then asks me 'Please login prior to pull:
Username:'

Sidenote: I'm behind corporate firewall, I use --insecure-registry extra args to get around certificate issues and using hyper-v for boot2docker...

Please advise,
Maad
